Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth, investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider Web. Breaking things down, Google-owned Websites accounted for the majority of the revenue generated at US$ 5.67 billion or 67%; up 28% from Q4 2009.
